data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LGuCG-qOgkUQ7kNvgGC0jWv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBJnSIvAZ8aywgh2odDbLqFpglhMaZbg3cVMpmrEXkmQQ&oe=66B5FBB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=15InYS2JR1sQ7kNvgECNXH2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCeYmzVpIIxzSah8mME_p6aTYKSxrPElixhTK7wbi7sMw&oe=66B60952)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dN6SY6X0QKwQ7kNvgFQzeIG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCbENNSrcI0_TXC0aJKStNqSQg5o6Bim4TJK7_2XmVDtw&oe=66B5F489)
